name: Pillars of Sorrow
description:
Pillars of Sorrow is a top down twinstick shooter, where you fight your inner demons while trying to regain your former self. After something vile happened you will be fighting tormenting thoughts, emptyness and Apathy as a lost soul. Will you be able to free your mind again?

The Game currently features
-two different worlds with over 30 different enemies
-4 boss fights
-collectable pets
-upgradeable skills

And will be frequently updated during early access.
